rsurveycto 0.0.0.9006

Access SurveyCTO data using the API

Source: R/scto.R
scto_pull.Rd

This function pulls data from SurveyCTO using the API.

scto_pull(
  auth,
  id,
  type = c("dataset", "form"),
  start_date = 0L,
  drop_empty_cols = TRUE,
  refresh = FALSE,
  cache_dir = "scto_data"
)

Arguments

auth

scto_auth() object.

id

String indicating ID of dataset or form to fetch.

type

String indicating type of SurveyCTO data.

start_date

Date, string coercible to a date, or an integer (corresponding to days since 1970-01-01) indicating earliest date for which to fetch data.

drop_empty_cols

Logical indicating whether to drop columns that contain only NA or only an empty string.

refresh

Logical indicating whether to fetch fresh data using the API or to attempt to load locally cached data.

cache_dir

String indicating path to directory in which to cache data.

Value

A data.table.

See also

scto_push()

Examples

if (FALSE) {
auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt')
test_data = scto_pull(auth, 'my_form', 'dataset')
}
